Reach Stance

Requirement: A weapon with the Reach trait.

With weapon and arm outstretched toward your opponents, you are prepared to out-range them, piercing defenses the moment they get close.

Pros

Personal Bubble

  • When a creature moves into your attack range, or when a mount moves you in range of a creature, you can use your reaction to make an opportunity attack against it.

Spin Attack

  • In place of an attack, you can swing your weapon around you in a circle. All creatures within your weapon’s reach must make a Dexterity (Save) check of DC 8 + Attack Modifier. On failure, the creature takes damage equal to the weapon’s damage modifier. The creature takes half damage on success.

Cons

Aphenphosmphobia

  • You have -2 to hit creatures within 5ft of you.
  • The DC for Spin Attack is reduced by 2 for creatures within 5ft of you.
